name: The Indie Game Legend
description: The Indie Game Legend is a retro top-down shooter that places emphasis on exploration with some puzzle solving. The player must rescue captive indie game developers while unraveling a story that probably only makes sense if you were an active member of the TIGSource community in 2011. Beyond its obscure references and in-jokes, TIGL is a feature-length retro game with an original soundtrack. Inspired by the NES cult classic, The Guardian Legend.
